name: architecturally

related to the art and practice of designing and making buildings: An architecturally acclaimed building houses the new museum. It's an architecturally distinctive neighbourhood. See
architectural
More examplesFewer examplesA long-vacant lot now holds an architecturally stunning home.They'll demolish most of the building but save its architecturally significant lobby. The town is architecturally undistinguished.
